Exposes.description: Modules that should be exposed by this container. Property names are used as public paths.

additionalProperties.description: Modules that should be exposed by this container.

ExternalsType.description: Specifies the default type of externals.

LibraryName.description: The name of the library (some types allow unnamed libraries too).

LibraryType.description: Type of library (types included by default are 'this', 'window', 'self', 'global', 'commonjs', 'commonjs2').

Remotes.description: Container locations from which modules should be resolved and loaded at runtime. Property names are used as request scopes.

additionalProperties.description: Container location from which modules should be resolved and loaded at runtime.

filename.description: The filename of the container as relative path inside the `output.path` directory.

remoteType.description: The external type of the remote containers.
